name: Exordi
description: Exordi builds on-demand production teams for brands to create visual content, at any scale, anywhere in the world. Think of us as your global production crew, ready to activate whenever and wherever you need it. We combine vetted 360deg creators with innovative processes to deliver exceptional content with unmatched efficiency.
one_liner: Exordi builds on-demand production teams for brands to create visual content, at any scale, anywhere in the world. Think of us as your global production crew, ready to activate whenever and wherever you need it. We combine vetted 360deg creators with innovative processes to deliver exceptional content with unmatched efficiency.
